email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Oceanic Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 is still a bit high for us. Can we settle at $50.75? Also, can you confirm the vessel's draft and any restrictions at the discharge port? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $50.75 per metric ton. The vessel's draft is 18.5m, and there are no restrictions at Rotterdam. Let me know if we can proceed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.75 works for us. Let's proceed with the MV Oceanic Star for the 15-20 October laycan. Please send over the charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I'll send over the charter party shortly. Thanks for the smooth negotiation. Best, Sarah
